markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scavenger's Search](/Feats.aspx?ID=5675) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to locate objects (including secret doors and hazards) you search for within 30 feet with a [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301) action.
name: Scavenger's Search
